<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Share Burden](/Spells.aspx?ID=2405)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 268

**Domain**
[Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=116)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** An ally within range is about to attempt a saving throw against a harmful [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590) effect, and you would not otherwise have to save against the effect.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** you and the triggering ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You shoulder some of your ally’s pain. Both you and your ally use the outcome one degree of success better than the result of your ally’s saving throw, even if the triggering effect usually affects only one target.
name: Share Burden
